data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=cMv1fqmkjq4Q7kNvgGDrIo1&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDZ8IM_heZH5ArHKj7vps_FPvX1XVl2naBu9x2kFLFwzQ&oe=66A386B7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=NVOkXDPqoU4Q7kNvgGgCCuf&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBERLxqust7tJyKNAg8z9zKyiH4JOm6Mu8dfEak0Uej9g&oe=66A39452)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=PtYpM07eaJ0Q7kNvgFnJZlS&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDIDZ-F5a8cqrLGLUG-fQfXb4IHZArfvf0JP3khZ_zW4w&oe=66A37F89)
